footer.description: Leading e-commerce platform for women in Madaba, providing high-quality products and an exceptional shopping experience.
footer.address: Madaba, Jordan - King Abdullah II Street
help.accountDesc: Manage your account and update your personal information
help.ordersDesc: Track your orders and manage previous purchases
help.description: Our help center provides comprehensive answers to all your questions
help.contactDescription: If you can't find the answer you're looking for, our support team is ready to help
faq.description: The most frequently asked questions from our valued customers with detailed answers
faq.q1: How can I create a new account?
faq.a1: You can create a new account by clicking the 'Login' button at the top of the page, then selecting 'Create Account' and filling in the required information.
faq.q2: How can I track my order?
faq.a2: After logging in, you can visit the 'My Orders' page in your dashboard to track the status of all your orders.
faq.a3: We accept cash on delivery, bank transfer, and major credit cards.
faq.a4: Delivery within Madaba takes 1-2 business days, and outside Madaba 3-5 business days.
faq.a5: Yes, you can return the product within 14 days from the date of receipt, provided it is in its original condition.
faq.q6: How can I contact the seller?
faq.a6: You can contact the seller directly through the 'Contact Seller' button on the product page.
faq.contactMessage: If you didn't find the answer to your question, don't hesitate to contact us directly.
privacy.intro: At Madaba Women Market, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
privacy.dataCollected.name: Full name and email address when creating an account
privacy.dataCollected.address: Shipping address and payment information when placing orders
privacy.dataCollected.usage: Usage data and shopping preferences to improve our service
privacy.usageText: We use your personal information to process orders, improve our services, and communicate with you about your orders and our new products. We will not share your information with third parties without your explicit consent.
privacy.securityText: We implement the latest security technologies to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or inappropriate use. All transactions are protected with SSL encryption.
privacy.rightsText: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can also withdraw your consent to process your data at any time by contacting us.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at: privacy@madabawomenmarket.com
terms.overviewContent: These Terms of Service govern your use of the Madaba Women Market platform. By using our services, you agree to these terms.
terms.acceptanceContent: By using our website or services, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
terms.servicesContent: We provide an e-commerce platform that connects sellers and buyers. We are not responsible for the quality of products or accuracy of descriptions, as this is the responsibility of the sellers.
terms.userObligationsContent: You must use our services in a legal and responsible manner, not violate the rights of others, or publish inappropriate or illegal content.
terms.contactContent: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us.
cookies.overviewContent: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website and provide personalized services.
cookies.essentialContent: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled. They include security and login cookies.
cookies.functionalContent: These cookies help remember your preferences like language and currency to improve your user experience.
cookies.analyticsContent: Help us understand how visitors use the website to improve our services and performance.
cookies.manageContent: You can manage your cookie preferences or accept them all.
